text: Liao Lei () was a KMT general from Guangxi. He participated in the Battle of Shanghai, the Battle of Wuhan, and the Battle of Xuzhou and the Battle of Suixian–Zaoyang in Hubei. He died of a stroke. Category:National Revolutionary Army generals from Guangxi Category:1890 births Category:1939 deaths Category:People from Yulin, Guangxi
title: Liao Lei
